trans-unit.source: Specifies the culture-specific display of digits.
trans-unit.target: 指定特定于区域的数字显示方式。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.DigitShapes> value specifies that no digit shape is substituted for the Unicode input, a digit shape is substituted based on context, or a native national digit shape is substituted for the input.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Globalization.DigitShapes>值指定任何数字形状替换为 Unicode 输入、 数字形状替换根据上下文，或输入替换本机国家/地区的数字形状。

trans-unit.source: The Arabic, Indic, and Thai languages have classical shapes for numbers that are different from the digits 0 through 9 (Unicode U+0030 through U+0039), which are most often used on computers.
trans-unit.target: 阿拉伯语、 印度语和泰语语言具有不同于数字 0 到 9 (Unicode U + 0030 到 U + 0039)，在计算机最常使用的数字的古典形状。

trans-unit.source: The application uses the <xref:System.Globalization.DigitShapes> enumeration with the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.DigitSubstitution%2A> property to specify how to display digits U+0030 through U+0039 in the absence of other formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序使用<xref:System.Globalization.DigitShapes>枚举<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.DigitSubstitution%2A>属性来指定如何显示数字 U + 0030 到 U + 0039 没有其他格式设置信息。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.DigitShapes> enumeration is primarily used by applications intended for cultures that use bidirectional scripts.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.DigitShapes>枚举主要由适用于使用双向脚本的区域性的应用程序。

trans-unit.source: For example, the reading order of Arabic and Indic scripts is bidirectional.
trans-unit.target: 例如，阿拉伯语和印度语的阅读顺序是双向的。

trans-unit.source: The digit shape depends on the previous text in the same output.
trans-unit.target: 数字形状取决于同一输出中前面的文本。

trans-unit.source: European digits follow Latin scripts; Arabic-Indic digits follow Arabic text; and Thai digits follow Thai text.
trans-unit.target: 拉丁文后使用欧洲语言样式的数字；阿拉伯语后使用阿拉伯-印度语数字；泰语后使用泰语数字。

trans-unit.source: The digit shape is the native equivalent of the digits from 0 through 9.
trans-unit.target: 数字形状是从 0 到 9 的数字的本地等效数字形状。

trans-unit.source: ASCII digits from 0 through 9 are replaced by equivalent native national digits.
trans-unit.target: 从 0 到 9 的 ASCII 数字被等效的本地文字替换。

trans-unit.source: The digit shape is not changed.

trans-unit.target: Unicode 可保持完全的兼容性。
